channel.title: Google Checkout API
channel.description:
Does anyone have any experience with the Google Checkout API?
I need it automated. I've automated several checkout systems before including PayPal and Onebip but I'm really struggling with Google Checkout. Some sites say you need SSL, others say you don't. The code supplied is full of classes and unneeded stuff designed for a massive eCommerce site.
I literally just need a user to place an order and then once processed Google posts back the quantity they ordered and then I can credit their account.
If anyone fancies helping me I could always offer payment in return. It's doing my head in.

item.title: Google Checkout API
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

http://code.google.com/p/google-checkout-php-sample-code/

Not sure how well it helps, but from the quick browse I had you can get the basic idea of how the handlers work

Read full topic

item.title: Google Checkout API
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Just remember, any time you automate something like this you need to be extra careful you don’t leave any gaps, or you will get people exploiting the system to give themselves free stuff.

Read full topic

item.title: Google Checkout API
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Last time I looked at it (I need to implement it too, one day…) it said trusted SSL was a requirement.

Read full topic
